settings.caption: CLINICALLY PROVEN TO add fun to FUNCTION

settings.text:
Elevate your active lifestyle with PureSource Beverages, a CBDa company that brings you a range of CBDa canned teas and sparkling waters, all crafted with a sugar-free monk fruit sweetened recipe. PureSource Beverages is dedicated to supporting your daily vitality with essential, functional energy.


Distinguished from other beverages, we prioritize movement as the key to our unique formula. Backed by clinical evidence, our products are designed to not only provide a boost of energy but also enhance your cognition, aiding in relief of anxiety, restlessness or nausea . Whether you're seeking an extra mindful push at the gym or a delightful pick-me-up to power through your day, PureSource Beverages is here to keep you balanced and focused on your goals.


Committed to quality, our beverages are made with only the finest ingredients. PureSource Beverages contain no artificial preservatives or flavors, no aspartame or high fructose corn syrup, and maintain a very low sodium content. Choose PureSource Beverages for a refreshing and health-conscious approach to staying present and achieving your lifestyle objectives.
.

settings.tab_content:
CBDª is the future

Tea consumption has been associated with potential benefits for burning calories and boosting metabolism. Research suggests that compounds in tea, such as catechins and caffeine, may stimulate thermogenesis and increase fat oxidation, contributing to calorie expenditure. Regular tea consumption, as part of a balanced diet and healthy lifestyle, may offer a modest yet significant support for weight management efforts.

CBDª is the future

CBDa has been linked to various potential benefits for physical health. Studies suggest it may help alleviate symptoms associated with chronic pain, inflammation, and certain neurological conditions. Additionally, CBD's potential to promote relaxation and reduce anxiety could indirectly support overall physical well-being by aiding in stress management.

CBDª is the future

CBDa has shown promise in promoting mental well-being through its potential to alleviate symptoms associated with anxiety, depression, and stress. Research suggests that CBDa may interact with serotonin receptors in the brain, which could contribute to its anxiolytic and mood-stabilizing effects. Incorporating it into a health regimen may offer additional support for those seeking alternative or adjunctive treatments.

CBDª is the future

Combining CBDa with tea could potentially offer a holistic approach to enhancing physical health. While tea provides antioxidants and potential metabolic benefits, CBD may complement these effects by reducing inflammation and promoting relaxation. Together, they may synergistically support overall well-being, providing a natural and enjoyable way to prioritize health.

CBDª is the future

Tea's antioxidants and potential metabolic benefits, combined with CBD's anti-inflammatory properties and ability to promote relaxation, create a synergistic effect that could enhance physical performance. By reducing inflammation and stress, CBDa may help optimize recovery and endurance, while tea's natural compounds may provide sustained energy and mental clarity. Incorporating both into a wellness routine could support overall physical performance and well-being.
